context: Figma, Inc. is a collaborative design platform focused on UI/UX design, prototyping, and design systems in the browser. Design tool of choice for product teams. FigJam whiteboard.

competitors.name: Sketch
competitors.notes: Mac design tool losing market share to Figma's collaboration features

competitors.name: Adobe XD
competitors.notes: Adobe's UI/UX design tool competing directly with Figma

competitors.name: InVision
competitors.notes: Prototyping platform with DSM and Freehand collaboration

competitors.name: Framer
competitors.notes: Design and prototyping tool with code-based interactions

competitors.name: Canva
competitors.notes: Browser-based design tool expanding into professional design

competitors.name: Zeplin
competitors.notes: Design handoff tool for developer collaboration
